button.aria-label: Open full menu and focus search field

div.div: See how support for VCU is making a difference

div.h1: Uh oh! The page you’re looking for is nowhere to be found.
div.p: First, double check the URL. If you continue to reach this page, please contact the Webmaster so we can correct our mistake.
Now, let’s help you find your way. To help locate your document you might try:

ul.li: VCU A to Z index, an alphabetical list of VCU websites
VCU home page, which has links to our most popular content
Or simply use the search field at the top of the page

a.title: Virginia Commonwealth University seal
a.aria-label: Visit vcu.edu through the University seal

img.alt: Simplified Virginia map showing RIchmond's location
